### Introduction

This Privacy Policy explains how the Majske igre application handles user data. By installing and using the app, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

### Data Collection and Use

The application does not collect any personal data from users. Data collection occurs exclusively in two ways:

- **Anonymized usage data** â€“ the app collects anonymized data about how the app is used, for the purpose of improving the user experience. These data do not identify individual users.
- **Device identifier for push notifications (push token)** â€“ the app obtains a unique device identifier used exclusively for delivering push notifications. This identifier is not linked to user identity and does not enable identification of any individual.

### Third-Party Services

The app uses Plausible Analytics, a privacy-focused, cookie-free analytics service that does not collect personal data. All data collected by Plausible are anonymized and processed in compliance with European data protection laws (GDPR).

### Device Permissions

The app may request the following permission:

- **Push notifications** â€“ to deliver updates about events, schedules, and information related to Majske igre.

Users can revoke this permission at any time through their device settings.

### Purpose of Processing

Anonymized usage data are used solely for analyzing app performance and improving functionality and user experience.

The device identifier is used exclusively for delivering push notifications and is not linked to any personal data.

### Data Retention

Anonymized usage data may be retained indefinitely, as they do not contain any personally identifiable information.

The device identifier is retained only as long as the app is installed or until the user revokes permission for push notifications.

### Data Sharing

The controller does not share personal data with any third party. Anonymized data transmitted to Plausible do not contain any personal data.

### Data Security

All data transmissions between the app and external services are secured via HTTPS encryption. The controller implements appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect data from unauthorized access or misuse.

### User Rights

Since the app does not process personal data on the controller's servers, users generally do not need to request access, correction, or deletion of personal data.

For any privacy-related questions or concerns, please contact: ğŸ“§ jakob.marusic@ssvets.si

### Changes to This Policy

The controller may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Users will be informed of any significant changes through notifications within the app or via the official website at www.majske-igre.si.
